attributes.action: To convert empty hotels and hostels into temporary isolation pods.
attributes.additional_details: The majority of hotels and hostels are empty or closed due to the impact of COVID19 on the travel industry. This initiative will help prevent spread of the virus.
attributes.background: We would like to petition the UK Government to convert empty hotels and hostels into temporary isolation pods for people who have tested positive for Codiv-19 and are showing mild symptoms, and those who have been in contact with them. The majority of hotels and hostels are currently empty or closed
